text:
Hi!
I require some JS (Svelte-built):
`{{ require_js(get_asset_url('../../main.js')) }}`
 which has the following line in it: `let msg = '{#each} only iterates over array-like objects.';`

This causes the JS to break with the error: `SyntaxError '' literal not terminated before end of script` on that exact line, obviously, since `{#` start to trigger HubL.
Can I escape in the `require_js` somehow, like `{% raw %}` ? (I tried without luck!)
